channel.title: Why
channel.description:
Why is it even though they see the 5-6 locked topics with titles like "HALP WIT MY SRVR" and they read that it's not suppose to be posted on these forums...
Why the hell do they still post the topics here? Are they just wanting to be hated by the community? Do they like being flamed? Do they like the yellow dot next to their name? >.O

item.title: Why
item.dc:creator: @bootnecklad bootnecklad
item.description:
@bootnecklad wrote:

[quote=“MastrChief, post:15, topic:123102”]Its amazing how hard it is to see:

[/quote]

First this i saw was the “NO MOPARSCAPE QUESTIONS!”

Read full topic

item.title: Why
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:10, topic:123102”][quote author=the fu superior link=topic=172846.msg1597499#msg1597499 date=1184449207]
maybe when someone clicks the button to create a new thread a reminder comes saying that moparscape questions belong on moparisthebest.com
[/quote]

If they have under 20 posts…[/quote]

Then what about when they’ve asked the question 20 times!!! There will be no reminder!!! :O!

Read full topic

item.title: Why
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“Evil_, post:11, topic:123102”][quote author=goatee link=topic=172846.msg1597494#msg1597494 date=1184449050]
IMO they should all get red dots.

But you have to realise that its only five… and Moparscape could have 100s of members finding it everyday. So if only 5 out of 100 go wrong then its not that bad.
[/quote]Just 5 on the first page, let’s check the other 100 pages…

Let’s also check any forum that says “Runescape” or “Java”[/quote]

And all the other random topics that they spam in…

Read full topic
